data: I was happily at work this morning among my butterbeansâ€”a vegetable of solid merit and of a far greater suitableness to my palate than such bovine watery growths as the squash and the beet.
I was happily at work this morning among my butterbeans--a vegetable of solid merit and of a far greater suitableness to my palate than such bovine watery growths as the squash and the beet.

Aftermath
Part second of "A Kentucky Cardinal"
